name: Convergence
description: Convergence is played mostly like Convoy, with the difference that the attacking team needs to capture a mission area first.

casual.description: Capture mission area (3 sections) then escort vehicle with extra time

name: Convoy
description: One team needs to escort a moving vehicle to the end of the map while the opposite team needs to stop them.

casual.description: Vehicle escort with faster movement and extra time

name: Domination
description: Two teams fight each other to hold control of a single point in a space called the Mission Area.

casual.description: Best-of-3 rounds with slower capture rate

competitive.description: Best-of-5 rounds with standard capture rate

name: Doom Match
description: It is a standard 8-12 player FFA deathmatch.

casual.description: FFA, first to 12 eliminations or most in 8 minutes

competitive.description: FFA, first to 16 eliminations or most in 7 minutes

name: Conquest
description: Standard team deathmatch mode in which players try to score as many eliminations as possible
